comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Reported not to work with the "lj5gray" drivers, use the "ljet4" or "lj4dith" drivers (or Gimp-Print or HPIJS) instead.

This printer seems to be more similar to the HP LaserJet 5L than to the other printers in the LaserJet 5 series.

Consumables/Refills: HP Toner Cartridge C3903A
